welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eastpointe, a charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore our vibrant streets and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Detroit City Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves smaller regional airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
